entity.name: React Native DevTools
entity.description: _(React Native built-in)_ The new default debugging experience introduced in React Native 0.76, leveraging Chrome DevTools Protocol (Console API, Sources & breakpoints) and providing integrated React DevTools functionality as a core feature.
entity.descriptionClean: (React Native built-in) The new default debugging experience introduced in React Native 0.76, leveraging Chrome DevTools Protocol (Console API, Sources  breakpoints) and providing integrated React DevTools functionality as a core feature.
entity.descriptionHtml: (React Native built-in) The new default debugging experience introduced in React Native 0.76, leveraging Chrome DevTools Protocol (Console API, Sources & breakpoints) and providing integrated React DevTools functionality as a core feature.

entity.name: Reactotron
entity.description: A desktop application for inspecting your React and React Native projects. Enables monitoring application's state, network requests, and performance metrics.
entity.descriptionClean: A desktop application for inspecting your React and React Native projects. Enables monitoring application's state, network requests, and performance metrics.
entity.descriptionHtml: A desktop application for inspecting your React and React Native projects. Enables monitoring application's state, network requests, and performance metrics.

entity.name: Radon IDE
entity.description: A better developer experience for React Native developers. A Visual Studio Code / Cursor IDE extension that aims to simplify the development of React Native applications.
entity.descriptionClean: A better developer experience for React Native developers. A Visual Studio Code / Cursor IDE extension that aims to simplify the development of React Native applications.

entity.name: Legacy JavaScript runtime debuggers
entity.description: _(React Native built-in)_ JavaScript runtime debugging solutions up to React Native 0.75 (from before React Native DevTools era) - experimental New Debugger, Hermes debugging or remote JavaScript debugging.
entity.descriptionClean: (React Native built-in) JavaScript runtime debugging solutions up to React Native 0.75 (from before React Native DevTools era) - experimental New Debugger, Hermes debugging or remote JavaScript debugging.
entity.descriptionHtml: (React Native built-in) JavaScript runtime debugging solutions up to React Native 0.75 (from before React Native DevTools era) - experimental New Debugger, Hermes debugging or remote JavaScript debugging.

entity.name: Flipper
entity.description: A desktop application enabling cross-platform debugging for mobile apps. Visualize, inspect, and control your apps from a desktop interface, with extensibility via plugins.
entity.descriptionClean: A desktop application enabling cross-platform debugging for mobile apps. Visualize, inspect, and control your apps from a desktop interface, with extensibility via plugins.

entity.name: Native debugging
entity.description: (Xcode, Android Studio) Platform-native tools for debugging app behavior, variables, and execution flow.
entity.descriptionClean: (Xcode, Android Studio) Platform-native tools for debugging app behavior, variables, and execution flow.

entity.name: Native profiling
entity.description: (Xcode, Android Studio) Platform-native tools for profiling app performance, memory usage, and resource consumption.
entity.descriptionClean: (Xcode, Android Studio) Platform-native tools for profiling app performance, memory usage, and resource consumption.

entity.name: Expo DevTools Plugins
entity.description: A plugin system for Expo DevTools that enables developers to create custom debugging and development tools. Allows integration of third-party debugging tools and custom functionality directly into the Expo development environment.
entity.descriptionClean: A plugin system for Expo DevTools that enables developers to create custom debugging and development tools. Allows integration of third-party debugging tools and custom functionality directly into the Expo development environment.

entity.name: Flashlight
entity.description: Lighthouse for Mobile - a web service that audits your app and gives a performance score to your Android apps.
entity.descriptionClean: Lighthouse for Mobile - a web service that audits your app and gives a performance score to your Android apps.

example.codeHighlighted: console.log("Hello React Native! 😊")

entity.name: React DevTools
entity.description: A desktop application providing Component Inspector and Performance Profiler panels, mirroring functionality from web browser extension. Now seamlessly integrated within React Native DevTools.
entity.descriptionClean: A desktop application providing Component Inspector and Performance Profiler panels, mirroring functionality from web browser extension. Now seamlessly integrated within React Native DevTools.
entity.descriptionHtml: A desktop application providing Component Inspector and Performance Profiler panels, mirroring functionality from web browser extension. Now seamlessly integrated within React Native DevTools.

entity.name: Element Inspector
entity.description: _(React Native built-in)_ A debugging utility that, once enabled, allows inspection of UI elements through direct interaction, displaying detailed component information upon tap directly within the app.
entity.descriptionClean: (React Native built-in) A debugging utility that, once enabled, allows inspection of UI elements through direct interaction, displaying detailed component information upon tap directly within the app.
entity.descriptionHtml: (React Native built-in) A debugging utility that, once enabled, allows inspection of UI elements through direct interaction, displaying detailed component information upon tap directly within the app.

entity.name: Performance Monitor
entity.description: _(React Native built-in)_ An integrated performance monitoring overlay that provides real-time metrics visualization. Allows inspection of RAM consumption, UI and JS threads FPS and number of views mounted.
entity.descriptionClean: (React Native built-in) An integrated performance monitoring overlay that provides real-time metrics visualization. Allows inspection of RAM consumption, UI and JS threads FPS and number of views mounted.
entity.descriptionHtml: (React Native built-in) An integrated performance monitoring overlay that provides real-time metrics visualization. Allows inspection of RAM consumption, UI and JS threads FPS and number of views mounted.

entity.name: Performance API (react-native-performance)
entity.description: A runtime library that delivers an implementation of the Performance API for React Native based on the User Timing Level 3 and Performance Timeline Level 2 drafts.
entity.descriptionClean: A runtime library that delivers an implementation of the Performance API for React Native based on the User Timing Level 3 and Performance Timeline Level 2 drafts.

entity.name: Network Inspector
entity.description: A network inspector available only in Expo projects that allows you to monitor and debug network requests made by your app.
entity.descriptionClean: A network inspector available only in Expo projects that allows you to monitor and debug network requests made by your app.
